title: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Massage Lotion For Stretch Marks with Vitamin E and Shea Butter Women Body Lotion, 8.5 Ounce
description: Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula® Massage Lotion for Stretch Marks.Advanced formula with Bio C-Elaste™.With Vitamin E, collagen, elastin and shea butter.All over body lotion.Helps reduce appearance of stretch marks.Paraben free phthalate.Dermatologist tested.250 ml/8.5 fl oz (U.S.) e.

title: Olay Regenerist Regenerating Lotion With Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 15 2.5 Fl Oz
description: If you spend any time outdoors, you need a daily moisturizer with sunscreen to help protect your skin from the sun's damaging rays, and help it look more energized. That's why the skincare experts at Olay developed Regenerist Regenerating Lotion with Sunscreen. This advanced lotion features Skin Energizing Technology, which includes an amino-peptide + B3 complex with vitamin C and Olay moisturizers. The lightweight formula helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by aiding surface cell turnover. This non-greasy and fast absorbing cream helps protect your skin from sun exposure with broad spectrum SPF 15 sunscreen and wont clog your pores. Just apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure, and reapply every 2 hours if you remain outdoors. Make Regenerist Regenerating Lotion with Sunscreen a regular part of your daily skincare regimen and reveal younger, healthier and more energetic-looking skin.

title: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Refill Pack, 25 Count
description: #1 Dermatologist Recommended Makeup Remover Towelette*Easy Makeup Removal for Fresh, Clean SkinClinically proven to remove 99.3 percent of your most stubborn makeup, even waterproof mascara. It can take two competitive wipes to do what one Neutrogena Towelette can do.With one step, Neutrogena makeup removers leave skin thoroughly clean with no heavy residue, so there's no need to rinse.Neutrogena Makeup Remover TowelettesAt a Glance:Gentle enough to use around sensitive eye area, even for contact lens wearersUltra soft pre-moistened clothsOphthalmologist testedDermatologist testedAllergy testedAlcohol freePatented Formula is as Gentle as Water to the EyesThese gentle, ultra soft cloths contain superior cleansing technology so effective it removes even waterproof mascara. And they are gentle enough to use around the sensitive eye area, even for contact lens wearers. Make your skin make-up free the easy way.How to UseGently wipe your face with a towelette, removing dirt and all traces of face and eye make-up. There is no need to rinse. Dispose of the towelette in a trash receptacle (do not flush).What's in the BoxNeutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Refill Pack (25 Pre-Moistened Towelettes).* Based on a survey performed in June 2011 by GfK Healthcare, an international independent market research agency, using a representative sample of 400 board-certified dermatologists.     Explore Neutrogena's Makeup Remover Options:Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes with Vanity Tub, 25-CountNeutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Night Calming, 25-CountRemove all traces of makeup while enjoying a unique calming fragrance that helps you unwind and prepares you for a good night's sleep.Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Refill Pack, 25-CountEffectively dissolve all traces of dirt, oil, and makeup--even waterproof mascara--for clean, fresh skin in one easy step.Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Deep Clean, 25-CountUltra-soft, pre-moistened wipes that effectively and gently sweep away makeup, dirt, and oil for clear, fresh skin.Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Refill Pack, 7-CountEffectively dissolve all traces of dirt, oil, and makeup--even waterproof mascara--for clean, fresh skin in one easy step.Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes Hydrating, 25-CountLeaves skin feeling soft and conditioned with a blend of replenishing hydrators and skin-soothing cucumber and aloe extracts.Trademark Information:Neutrogena®Neutrogena Fresh Foaming Cleanser®Neutrogena Deep Clean®
